name: Holy Roman Empire
startIntroPart1: By the Grace of God, all hail Kaiser Leopold I, Holy Roman Emperor! The Holy Roman Empire is the legal descendant of the Roman Empire. As such, the Holy Roman Empire holds preeminence upon the rulers of Christendom. The Holy Roman Empire holds dominion over Austria, Germany, Bohemia, Lichtenstein, Switzerland, the Low Countries, eastern France and northern Italy. At the same time, you are also the King of Hungary and Croatia. Thus, you also hold dominion over Hungary, the Triune Kingdom of Croatia and Transylvania along with a claim to the kingdom of Serbia. Despite multiple wars, the Holy Roman Empire endures! As long as the Holy Roman Empire stands, Christendom lives!
startIntroPart2: Your Imperial and Royal Majesty, the peoples of the Empire are asking you to help lead the Empire to victory against all those who oppose it! Will you uphold Christendom? Can you build a civilization that will stand the test of time?
declaringWar: You dare threaten the empire? This means war!
attacked: We will only receive your utter submission!
defeated: The defeat of the Holy Roman Empire is the death of Christendom. Dark times are upon us all.
introduction: As the emperor of the Holy Roman Empire, you are worthy of our attention.
tradeRequest: You will have the privilege of trading with us.
uniques: +50% Production towards any buildings that already exist in the Capital

name: Montenegro
startIntroPart1: May God be with us, o holy Metropolitan Danilo I! The holy land of Montenegro is ours! We have a long road ahead of us! The Ottomans will fear us!
startIntroPart2: Your Eminence, Montenegro calls upon you to lead and protect it! Will you make Montenegro great? Can you build a civilization that will stand the test of time?
declaringWar: You will pay for your war!
uniques: +1 Sight for all land military units
Units ignore terrain costs when moving into any tile with Hills

name: Serbia
startIntroPart1: May God be with us, all hail Stefan the First-Crowned, King of Serbia! Great and holy Serbia had arisen! No longer are we just the Grand Principality of Serbia. Nay, you are a king! We have a long road ahead of us! We will supplant Byzantium!
startIntroPart2: Your Royal Highness, Serbia calls upon you to lead it to greatness and glory! Will you make Serbia great? Can you build a civilization that will stand the test of time?
declaringWar: Your lands will make a glorious addition to the kingdom of Serbia!
uniques: +1 Sight for all land military units
Melee units pay no movement cost to pillage

name: Teutonic Order
startIntroPart1: Hail the Hochmeister of the Order of Brothers of the German House of Saint Mary in Jerusalem! We are the Teutonic Order, an order of German crusaders. As such, we are tasked to defend the Holy Land and bring the Gospel to the peoples of Lithuania. If anyone resists, we fight back! In 1192, the order was founded in Acre to protect that vital port. With our order's defeat, we went from Transylvania in 1211 to Prussia in 1230. Now, we fight for the Gospel against the heathens!
startIntroPart2: The Teutonic Order needs your leadership, herr Hochmeister! Your people look to you to bring the empire back to life once more. Will you accept the challenge? Will you build a civilization that will stand the test of time?
declaringWar: Do not fret, this war is ordained by God.
attacked: A terrible misfortune will strike you, heretic!
defeated: If this is God's will, then I bitterly accept it...
introduction: Greetings stranger, you have met the pious Teutonic Order.
hateHello: Your actions are heretical, be swift with what you have to say.
tradeRequest: The Order is willing to permiss this trade.
uniques: Units fight as though they were at full strength even when damaged

name: Poland-Lithuania
startIntroPart1: All hail noble King and Grand Duke John III, protector and sovereign of the Polish-Lithuanian Commonwealth. Your rise to the throne is marked by problem after problem ranging from The Deluge to the Lipka Rebellion. Even your reign is mostly spent fighting for your realms and for Christendom. Your greatest achievement is the Siege of Vienna where you and your armies have saved the Imperial city of Vienna from the rapacious Turks and their thralls.
startIntroPart2: Heroic king and grand duke John, your realms want you to lead them to glory. Can you make your realms into a powerhouse of Europe? Will you conquer all those who oppose you, or strive for peaceful relations? Can you build a civilization that will stand the test of time?
attacked: I'll personally lead my armies to your demise!
introduction: Welcome to the Kingdom of Poland and the Grand Duchy of Lithuania, stranger.
uniques: Culture cost of adopting new Policies reduced by [15]%

name: Bohemia
startIntroPart1: All hail king Ottokar I, king-elector of Bohemia! Under your rule, Bohemia had finally become a kingdom under the Holy Roman Empire. Bohemia plays a vital role as the head of the empire's secular electors.
startIntroPart2: Great king Ottokar, the kingdom of Bohemia wants your leadership. Will you make Bohemia into a European power? Will you accept the challenge? Can you build a civilization that will stand the test of time?
defeated: You have won and I am your subject.
introduction: Welcome to Lands of the Crown of St. Wenceslaus.
tradeRequest: I am ready for this deal.
